CHAT.comment: IGNACIO CARLOS FLORES-FIGUEROA, Petitioner v. UNITED STATES.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:12 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF KEVIN K. RUSSELL ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF TOBY J. HEYTENS ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF KEVIN K. RUSSELL ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 12:09 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
